agildash_system_status_values_tbl.system_status_desc: system is open to all users for read and authorized update

agildash_system_status_values_tbl.system_status_msgtext: System is in Read-only mode until hh:mm XXX (TimeZone) mm/dd/yyyy due to maintenance
agildash_system_status_values_tbl.system_status_desc: system is only open to authorizied Admin users {see access control} for update; all users will have read-only access

agildash_system_status_values_tbl.system_status_msgtext: System is unavailable for all users until hh:mm XXX (TimeZone) mm/dd/yyyy for conversion processing
agildash_system_status_values_tbl.system_status_desc: System status: system is only open to authorizied Admin users {see access control} for read and authorized update; general users will be blocked from read and update access; general users may be presented a splash page indicating a system status message
